attributes.action: Abolish party politics and bring in true democracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we elect MP's only for them to go to London and be whipped into following the party line? Surely we should have true independent MP's working for the people and voting with their own conscience.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
